about_the_game:
Elevate your gaming experience with Crosshair Genie, a versatile, lightweight overlay ready to adapt to your needs!

Overlay Key Features



  • Scaling and Repositioning on-the-fly.
  • No added Input Lag.
  • Consistent crosshairs between games.
  • Exclusive fullscreen and windowed support
  • Compatible with external overlays meaning no interference with other overlays.
  • Auto-adjusts to fit game resolutions, including stretch resolutions.
  • Light on System Resources resulting in less of an impact on your gaming experience.
  • Anti-cheat Compliant and non-intrusive.
  • Show and Hide functionality via mouse.
  • No Xbox Game Bar required.

Unlock the full capabilities of the overlay by utilising the Designer to perfectly craft a unique and accurate crosshair fit for you and your desired game. Experiment with different tools and tweak your crosshair for the best settings.

Designer Key Features



  • Useful Tools used to make changes to your crosshair.
  • Configurable pixel-space to make meaningful changes required to have a precise crosshair.
  • Preview window to see real-time what the crosshair will look like once shown in the overlay
  • Customisable tool size slider to change multiple pixels simultaneously.
  • Settings window to adjust overlay information (Position, Scale and Visibility) and modify Hotkeys used for both; the Designer and the Overlay.
  • Zoom and Pan functionality such as zooming in and out, resetting the view and panning around the scene to align efficiently.
  • Colour Picker featuring recently selected colours which allows for the necessary colours to be used in your crosshair.
  • Undo and Redo functionality to go back on your mistakes with no worries.
  • Image Loading and Saving so you can either design your crosshair from scratch or use an existing image.
  • Presets allowing you to make a decision on what kind of crosshair best matches you.
  • Resize Canvas enabling you to resize things if enough detail can't be shown for your crosshair.
  • Visibility Preferences such as toggling visibility for grid lines, crosshair lines and more.
